input_text.Prompt:
Using the item keywords and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
United States Army Three Shade Gameroom Lamp, 60"

Item keywords:
Lamp Dimensions: 14 x 14 x 9.5-Inch
Officially Licensed Art on Both Sides of Each Polyresin Lamp Shade
Metal Hardware and Chain, Cord Mounted ON/OFF Switch,2 Hanging Chains with Hanging Hardware Measure 53.5-Inch in Length Each
110V Household Outlets, Recommended Bulb Wattage: 60W (Requires 3 Bulbs, Not Included),Three Prong Cord Measures 58-Inch in Length
Overall Dimensions: 14 x 60 x 9.5-Inch

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Feeling a little dim? Light up your life and illuminate your game room, garage, or collection with this officially licensed 60" United States Army Three Shade Gameroom Lamp. Sporting dimensions measuring 14 x 14 x 9.5-Inch, this sports officially licensed art on both sides of each polyresin lamp shade! Made of metal hardware with a chain with a cord-mounted ON/OFF switch, two hanging chains with hanging hardware measuring 53.5-Inch in length each, and a three-prong cord measuring 58-Inch in length, this addition is sure to light up your space! Simply requiring 110V household outlets and a recommended bulb wattage of 60W (Requires 3 Bulbs, Not Included), you'll be able to brighten up your favorite area with this one-of-a-kind billiard lamp in no time! Don't waste time in the dark, purchase your very own United States Army Three Shade Gameroom Lamp today!
input_text.Response B: Brighten up your game room with this officially licensed United States Army three shade lamp. The lamp is made of polyresin and features a double-sided design with the United States Army logo on one side and a military-themed design on the other. The metal hardware and chain, along with the cord mounted on/off switch, add durability and convenience. The two hanging chains with hanging hardware measure 53.5 inches in length each, and the three-prong cord measures 58 inches in length. The recommended bulb wattage is 60 watts, and the lamp is designed to fit into 110V household outlets. Overall dimensions: 14 x 60 x 9.5 inches. This lamp is a great way to show your military pride and add some light to your game room, office, or home.
